Package examples.nntp

Class Summary
ExtendedNNTPOps Simple class showing some of the extended commands (AUTH, XOVER, LIST ACTIVE)
MessageThreading  
newsgroups This is a trivial example using the NNTP package to approximate the Unix newsgroups command.
NNTPUtils Some convenience methods for NNTP example classes.
post This is an example program using the NNTP package to post an article to the specified newsgroup(s).
